html:
The German Bank KFW, through the Organization of the Treaty of the Amazon Basin ACTO; and the agreement signed between the Ministry of Production, with the Regional Government of Loreto, delivered goods and equipment in custody to the Regional Directorate of Production.

This delivery was in charge of the governor of Loreto, Elisban Ochoa Sosa, in the DIREPRO auditorium, consisting of: six desktop computers, three laptops, six monitors, six stabilizers, three multifunctional laser printers and two Gps.

The purpose is to support activities to strengthen CITES procedures in the Peruvian Amazon and fishing and aquaculture activities, for the control of endangered species.

"This is part of an articulated work, despite not being able to count on the oil canon, but we have human capital, and as long as it exists, with the little economic capital it can be carried out, this and many other projects," said the regional governor, Elisban Ochoa Sosa.
